snippet: Gen. John F. Campbell, the American military commander, told the Senate Armed Services Committee that Afghan forces had retaken the city.
abstract: Taliban appears to once again gain upper hand in taking Afghan city of Kunduz; half of city is reported to be under group's control.

byline.original: By ROD NORDLAND and NAJIM RAHIM
byline.contributor: Rod Nordland reported from Kabul, and Najim Rahim from Kunduz. Ahmad Shakib and Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: Gen. John F. Campbell, the American military commander, told the Senate Armed Services Committee that Afghan forces had retaken the city.

headline.main: Taliban Gain Advantage in Tug of War in Kunduz
headline.print_headline: Taliban Gain Advantage in Tug of War in Kunduz
